index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an application for a grant and an agreement with the State of Washington, Department of Social and Health Services, to provide financial assistance to establish an Area Wide Model Project to coordinate a service delivery system for the homebound low-income elderly, increasing an Object of Expenditure in the 1974 Budget of the Department of Human Resources, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
